ctsnamespace.description: The "First Thousand Years of Greek" project's inventory of Greek texts.

collection.dc:title: Editions of texts created for the Homer Multitext project.
collection.dc:creator: Christopher W. Blackwell
Neel Smith
collection.dc:coverage: All texts currently released through the HMT project's Nexus repository, and only those texts.
collection.dc:description: Diplomatic editions of texts from papyrus and manuscript sources including texts of the Iliad.
collection.dc:rights: Licensed under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license (CC BY-SA 3.0).

collection.dc:title: Manuscripts
collection.dc:creator: Neel Smith
Christopher W. Blackwell
collection.dc:coverage: Diplomatic editions of Byzantine and Medieval manuscripts in the Homer Multitext project's published editions.
collection.dc:description: Diplomatic editions of Byzantine and Medieval manuscripts in the Homer Multitext project's published editions.
collection.dc:rights: Licensed under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported license (CC BY-SA 3.0).

edition.label: VenetusA
edition.description: Metrical summaries of each book [= 9.385], and an epigram attributed to Hadrian [= 9.387], from the Venetus A manuscript (Marciana 454 = 822)
